summary: Contoso Wireless offers internet plans with download speeds ranging from 25 Mbps to 1 Gbps, all of which include unlimited data. They offer a variety of packages to meet any budget and need, including their Unlimited Plus, Max, and Ultra packages. All plans come with 24/7 technical support and a 30-day money back guarantee. Additionally, they offer free installation and no contracts. They also have a limited time promotion where new customers can get 50% off their first month's bill when they sign up for an Unlimited Plus plan.
